products.name: Pore-Reducing Toner
products.description: A lightweight toner that helps refine pores and balance excess oil. Must be applied after cleanser, twice a day.
products.allIngredients: Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Polysorbate 20, Adenosine, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Arctium Lappa, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Sodium PCA, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Oleth-10, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol

products.name: Enriched Calming Toner
products.description: A soothing toner designed to calm and hydrate sensitive, dry skin. Must be applied after cleanser, twice a day.
products.allIngredients: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, Dimethiconol, Oenothera Biennis Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Allantoin, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Superoxide Dismutase, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Myristamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid

products.name: Uncented Witch Hazel Toner
products.description: A gentle, alcohol-free toner that refreshes and soothes the skin. Must be applied after cleanser, twice a day.
products.allIngredients: AQUA / WATER / EAU, GLYCERIN, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA BARK/LEAF/TWIG EXTRACT - WITCH HAZEL BARK/LEAF/TWIG EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYSORBATE 20, PHENOXYETHANOL

products.name: Calendula Herbal Extract Toner
products.description: A calming toner infused with calendula to help soothe and refresh skin. Must be applied after cleanser, twice a day.
products.allIngredients: AQUA / WATER,PROPYLENE GLYCOL,PROPANEDIOL,PHENOXYETHANOL,CHLORPHENESIN,ARCTIUM LAPPA ROOT EXTRACT,DISODIUM EDTA,CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT,CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER,HYDROLYZED CORN STARCH,ALLANTOIN,HEDERA HELIX EXTRACT - IVY LEAF/STEM EXTRACT,GLYCERIN,ALTHAEA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT,SODIUM HYDROXIDE,CITRIC ACID

products.name: AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner
products.description: An exfoliating toner that helps clear pores and improve skin texture. Must be applied once a day, in the morning, after cleanser.
products.allIngredients: Water, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Lactate, Glycolic Acid, Betaine Salicylate, Allantoin, Panthenol, Ethyl Hexanediol

products.name: Serozinc Toner
products.description: A refreshing mist toner that helps reduce oiliness and soothe skin. Must be applied once a day, in the morning, after cleanser.

products.name: Cream Skin Cerapeptide™ Toner & Moisturizer
products.description: A nourishing toner that combines the hydration of a cream with the freshness of a toner. Must be applied after cleanser, twice a day.
products.allIngredients: WATER / AQUA / EAU, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, LIMNANTHES ALBA (MEADOWFOAM) SEED OIL, ISOPENTYLDIOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, SQUALANE, POLYGLYCERYL-10 STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, INULIN LAURYL CARBAMATE, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, DISODIUM EDTA, CARBOMER, MANNITOL, ACRYLATES/STEARYL METHACRYLATE COPOLYMER, TREMELLA FUCIFORMIS SPOROCARP EXTRACT, HYALURONIC ACID, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, XANTHAN GUM, CERAMIDE NP, CAMELLIA JAPONICA FLOWER EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL, ACETYL TETRAPEPTIDE-11

products.name: Soothing Facial Toner
products.description: A gentle toner formulated to soothe and hydrate sensitive skin. Must be applied after cleanser, twice a day.

products.description: A gentle exfoliating toner that helps clarify skin while soothing irritation.
